com.google.wave.api
Class RobotSerializer

java.lang.Object
  com.google.wave.api.RobotSerializer

public class RobotSerializer
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class to serialize and deserialize Events and Operations to and from JSON string for V2.* of the protocol.

Constructor Detail

RobotSerializer

public RobotSerializer(java.util.NavigableMap<ProtocolVersion,Gson> gsons,
                       ProtocolVersion defaultProtocolVersion)
Constructor. Note that the defaultprotocol version must occur in the map of Gsons.

Parameters:
gsons - an map of Gsons for serializing and deserializing JSON, keyed by protocol version.
defaultProtocolVersion - the default protocol version.
Method Detail

deserialize

public <T> T deserialize(java.lang.String jsonString,
                         java.lang.reflect.Type type,
                         ProtocolVersion protocolVersion)
Deserializes the given JSON string into an instance of the given type.

Type Parameters:
T - the generic type of the given class.
Parameters:
jsonString - the JSON string to deserialize.
type - the type to deserialize the JSON string into.
protocolVersion - the wire protocol version of the given JSON string.
Returns:
an instance of type, that is constructed by deserializing the given jsonString

deserializeOperations

public java.util.List<OperationRequest> deserializeOperations(java.lang.String jsonString)
                                                       throws InvalidRequestException
Deserializes operations. This method supports only the new JSON-RPC style operations.

Parameters:
jsonString - the operations JSON string to deserialize.
Returns:
a list of OperationRequest,that represents the operations.
Throws:
InvalidRequestException - if there is a problem deserializing the operations.

serializeOperations

public java.lang.String serializeOperations(java.util.List<OperationRequest> operations)
                                     throws JsonParseException
Serializes a list of OperationRequest objects into a JSON string.

Parameters:
operations - List of operations to serialize.
Returns:
A JSON string representing the serialized operations.
Throws:
JsonParseException
